summary: REQ-64 and REQ-65 appear implemented via new named rollout-steps markdown and adding an explicit Step 9 heading to the manual verification checklist. However, the diff also includes multiple unrelated changes (backend and project metadata, plus apparent frontend code normalization work) that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend Motoko code changes in backend/main.mo, despite the request only being documentation updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements REQ-64 and REQ-65 only ask for markdown documentation updates; no backend behavior/code changes were requested and constraints emphasize preserving the existing backend architecture.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend implementation work related to upgrade-safe array normalization and related-record linking across multiple React components/pages (as described in the repo summary file).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-64/REQ-65 are documentation-only; the diff summary indicates substantive frontend code changes (hooks/components/pages) beyond adding step-name documentation.
Not requested by REQ-64/REQ-65 and unrelated to the named-step documentation deliverables.
